author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Coca-Cola Co ‍Announces It Is Fundamentally Reshaping Its Approach To Packaging
text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - Coca-Cola Co:
* COCA-COLA CO - ‍ANNOUNCED TODAY THAT IT IS FUNDAMENTALLY RESHAPING ITS APPROACH TO PACKAGING​
* COCA-COLA CO - ‍SETS GLOBAL GOAL TO HELP COLLECT AND RECYCLE EQUIVALENT OF 100% OF ITS PACKAGING BY 2030​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
